<title level="1" right="Rules">[Casting Cantrips from a Staff](/Rules.aspx?ID=750)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 592 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
If a staff contains a cantrip, you can cast that cantrip using the staff without expending any charges. The cantrip’s level is heightened to the same level as cantrips you cast.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
name: Casting Cantrips from a Staff
